solution.text:
Since Number of workers and number of days are inversely proportional XY = K
Therefore, K \(= 1 \times _{{10*j}}_\)
Now, 24 hours = 1 day
Therefore number of workers to complete job in one day \(= \frac K1 = \frac {_{{10*j}}_}{1}\)
\(\Rightarrow\) Number of workers = _{{10*j}}_

content.text: One worker can complete a job in _{{10*j}}_ days. How many workers will it take to complete the same job in 24 hours?
